name: local_file_search_open
description: Search files on Windows by keyword with scope options (entire machine, C:, D:, or custom path), optionally open the file location in Explorer.
author: AnythingllmSkills

keyword.description: Keyword to search for in file names (case-insensitive).

searchScope.description: Search scope: all (entire machine), c (C drive), d (D drive), or custom (use rootPath). Default: d

rootPath.description: Search root folder path when searchScope=custom. Default: D:\

maxResults.description: Maximum number of matched files to return. Default: 20

openExplorer.description: If true, open Windows Explorer and select the first matched file. Default: false
